info.sourceTextContent: Pero el capitan y los demas soldados despreciaron nuestro dictámen, y manteniendo el suyo, prosiguieron la marcha: y llegado á media legua de los Carcokies, ya se habian plantado á la falda de un monte, cerca de un bosque, para escapar si los venciésemos.
info.suspiciousTextContent: However, the captain as well as his army disdained our thoughts on this and kept marching so as to come within a half league of Carcokies. They camped close to a forest at the base of a hill so as to be able to get away if the venciesemos....
